ing: 2 carrots, shaved into strips using a vegetable peeler
n: Kale, Carrot, and Sunflower Seed Salad
des: "This super simple salad is packed with goodies to give you energy and stay full!"
ins: Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, apple cider vinegar, nutritional yeast, oregano, and basil together in a large bowl. Add carrots, kale, quinoa, and sunflower seeds; toss to combine.
